actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Buy American Act to provide that the price of domestic goods shall not be deemed unreasonable unless it exceeds the price of foreign goods by more than 50 percent.

summary.text: Revises the "Buy American Act" to provide that unmanufactured and manufactured goods produced in the United States shall not be considered unreasonable for public contracts unless the bid or offered price exceeds such foreign price or bid by more than fifty percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Buy American Act to provide that the price of domestic goods shall not be deemed unreasonable unless it exceeds the price of foreign goods by more than 50 percent.
